squadup.title: Software Engineer
squadup.description: Full-stack developer building scalable SaaS platforms with modern technologies. Led the development of 3 main products serving companies across multiple industries.

lbp.name: Local Business Protection - Local SEO Monitoring & Protection Platform
lbp.description: SaaS system for automated competitor monitoring on Google Maps and local SEO positioning protection for businesses.
achievements: Developed scalable serverless architecture with 3 specialized Lambda functions processing over 10,000 monthly competitor scans
Implemented automated grid scanning system reducing scan time from 2 hours to 15 minutes per location (87.5% improvement)
Optimized complex SQL queries with CTEs and LATERAL JOINs, improving report performance by 75% (from 8 seconds to 2 seconds)
Integrated 8+ external services (Google Maps, Stripe, AWS Location, Slack, PostHog) with 99.9% availability

afterhour.name: Afterhour - AI Voice Assistant Platform
afterhour.description: AI-powered voice assistant SaaS platform for businesses (primarily law firms) handling 24/7 incoming calls and automatic prospect qualification.
achievements: Implemented AI voice assistant system processing and analyzing calls in real-time, extracting structured information from potential clients
Automated prospect qualification with AI algorithms
Designed scalable multi-tenant architecture supporting multiple organizations with role-based access control

aptiqude.name: Aptiqude - Candidate Assessment SaaS Platform via IQ Tests
aptiqude.description: Complete talent assessment system allowing companies to evaluate candidates through IQ tests with advanced performance analysis and comprehensive recruitment process management.
achievements: Developed scalable multi-tenant architecture with data isolation per organization, handling multiple companies simultaneously
Implemented serverless architecture on AWS Lambda with automated deployment
Optimized performance with lazy loading, code splitting, and caching with TanStack Query, improving load times by 40%

valdera.title: Fullstack React + Node Developer
achievements: Feature Delivery: Bi-weekly delivery of new features improving user experience
Code Quality: 40% increase in test coverage, reducing production defects by 20%
Shared Component Library: Design and maintenance of reusable component library, accelerating development by 25%
CI/CD Optimization: Pipeline optimization with GitHub Actions and GCloud Build, reducing deployment time by 50%
Leadership: Onboarding and mentoring of junior developers, fostering collaboration culture

darwoft.title: Fullstack React + Node Developer

achievements: MVP Development: Leadership in MVP development with ReactJS, increasing delivery speed by 30%
UI/UX Implementation: Development of styled and responsive components aligned with modern standards
Authentication Systems: Integration of secure multi-platform authentication solutions
Collaboration: Work with cross-functional teams to meet tight deadlines
